price: Na tungeli taka tungeli peleka katika kila mji Mwonyaji.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا
footnotes: Na lau kuwa tumetaka basi tungeli mpeleka mwonyaji kwenye kila mji. Basi jitahidi na wito wako; na wacha maneno ya makafiri; na tupilia mbali wanayo yaleta.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
